item.title: Harriet add a quote by Michael Moore
item.description: "[Librarians] are subversive. You think they're just sitting there at the desk, all quiet and everything. They're like plotting the revolution, man. I wouldn't mess with them." -- Michael Moore

item.title: Harriet add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My Best Friend is a person who will give me a book I have not read." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Harriet add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Never laugh at live dragons." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Harriet add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "To all my librarian friends, champions of books, true magicians in the House of Life. Without you, this writer would be lost in the Dust." -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Harriet add a quote by Liane Holliday Willey
item.description: "Females with ASDs often develop ‘coping mechanisms’ that can cover up the intrinsic difficulties they experience. They may mimic their peers, watch from the sidelines, use their intellect to figure out the best ways to remain undetected, and they will study, practice, and learn appropriate approaches to social situations. Sounds easy enough, but in fact these strategies take a lot of work and can more often than not lead to exhaustion, withdrawal, anxiety, selective mutism, and depression. -Dr. Shana Nichols" -- Liane Holliday Willey
